job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Munich Re America Services (MRAS) is a shared service organization that delivers services to all Munich Re US P&C Companies and other group entities.We're adding to our diverse team of experts and are looking to hire those who are committed to building a culture that enables the creation of innovative solutions for our business units and clients. The CompanyAs a member of Munich Re's US operations, we offer the financial strength and stability that comes with being part of the world's preeminent insurance and reinsurance brand. Our risk experts work together to assemble the right mix of products and services to help our clients stay competitive - from traditional reinsurance coverages, to niche and specialty reinsurance and insurance products. The OpportunityFuture focused and always one step ahead The Business Technology (BT) unit works closely with business leaders to drive innovation and business transformation, spearheading the digitalization of Munich Re's business activities. The focus areas for the BT unit are outlined below:Digital Insurance Platforms and EcosystemsAdvanced Analytics and Big DataArtificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Automation SolutionsMicro Service, APIs and Cloud ArchitecturesCyber SecurityWeb and mobile distributionThe Machine Learning Engineerwill be part of a cross-functional Agile development team to deliver high-quality digital solutions across a broad range of innovation initiatives, while championing quality and good coding practices. Your JobCollaborate with different business units on building Data/ML ApplicationsBuild and maintain robust scalable data pipelines and machine learning pipelines in Microsoft AzureOptimize data ingestion process for better reliability and throughputDesign and develop data models for Machine Learning as well as AnalyticsOwn projects from design through delivery with ongoing supportCommunicate effectively across diverse disciplines(with Product, Data Science, Actuarial, etc) to collect requirements.Build CI/CD pipelines for Infrastructure provisioning/configuration, application deployment, etc.Develop expert knowledge of Data and ML infrastructure within Munich ReSuccessful candidates should possess the following skills/capabilities:Bachelor's degree (MS preferred) in Computer Science, Statistics, Math or equivalent combination of education and experienceExtensive data modeling and data architecture skills3+ years of hands-on experience with scikit-learn, tensorflow or pytorch3+ years of building and operating Machine Learning Production System5+ years of hands-on Python, R, or Java experience requiredExpert SQL skills including T-SQL, Hive, Spark SQL, etc.Expert Knowledge in cloud technologies such as Azure App Services, Azure Kubernetes, Azure DatabricksExperience in data pipeline development using Azure Data Factory, T-SQL, PySpark, Airflow, etc.Experience with data visualization tools such as Power BIDrive and dedication, as well as creativity and hands-on attitudeCuriosity in searching for new solutions outside of traditional approachesDemonstrated ability to experiment with and learn new technologiesStrong oral and written communication and interpersonal skillsExcellent analytical, problem solving and organizational skillsAt Munich Re US, we see Diversity and Inclusion as a solution to the challenges and opportunities all around us. Our goal is to foster an inclusive culture and build a workforce that reflects the customers we serve and the communities in which we live and work. We strive to provide a workplace where all of our colleagues feel respected, valued and empowered to achieve their very best every day. We recruit and develop talent with a focus on providing our customers the most innovative products and services. We are an equal opportunity employer. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.
